title: Life expectancy of women in Mexico 2017
yAxis: Life expectancy at birth in years
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Life expectancy at birth in years, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2007.
Differently, the next significant trend is extremely neutral which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: The statistic shows the life expectancy of women at birth in Mexico from 2007 to 2017 . In 2017 , the average life expectancy of women at birth in Mexico was about 77.83 years .
